items.sentence: Tom didn\'t want to give the wrong impression.
Tom doesn\'t allow his children to drink wine.
Tom is lying on the grass under an apple tree.
Tom knew Mary had been lying to him all along.
Tom looked both ways before crossing the road.
Tom pays rent on the first day of every month.
Tom might run into Mary while he\'s in Boston.
Tom probably knows more than he\'s telling us.
I\'m sorry I wasn\'t able to help you do that.
I\'m sorry, but I didn\'t catch what you said.
